jokeBackups: I told my wife she was drawing her eyebrows too high. She looked surprised.

I used to be a baker, but I couldn't make enough dough.
Why don't skeletons fight each other? They don't have the guts.
adviceBackups: If you're good at something, never do it for free.
Confidence is key, even if you have to fake it at first.

If you were a boat, you'd be a worship.

Is your name Gravity? Because you're the only thing keeping me grounded.
Are you a prize? Because I want to win you.
If you were a ghost, you'd be my favorite boo.
Are you a lock? Because I have the key.
Is your name Future? Because you're looking bright.
Are you a melody? Because I can't stop humming you.
If you were a season, you'd be the only one I need.
Are you a map? Because you've got everything I'm looking for.
Is your name Magic? Because you're enchanting.
Are you a spark? Because you've started a fire.
If you were a dream, I'd never wake up.
Are you a queen? Because you've got the crown.
Is your name Destiny? Because we were meant to be.
Are you a treasure? Because I've been searching for you.
If you were a star, you'd be the one I wish on.
Are you a miracle? Because I can't explain how beautiful you are.
Is your name Legend? Because you're one of a kind.
insults: YOU ARE THE REASON THE GENE POOL NEEDS A LIFEGUARD.

quotes: Forgetting is like a wound. The wound may heal but it has already left a scar. ~Luffy
When do you think people die? When they are forgotten. ~Dr. Hiriluk
Justice will prevail you say? But of course it will! Whoever wins this war becomes justice! ~Doflamingo
No matter how hard or impossible it is, never lose sight of your goal. ~Luffy
If I die fighting for it, that's fine. I will fight until the end. ~Luffy
Being alone is more painful than getting hurt. ~Luffy
Fools who don't respect the past are doomed to repeat it. ~Nico Robin
One die-hard effort is better than a hundred cowardly attempts. ~Sanji
Miracles only happen to those who never give up. ~Ivankov
Saying you want to die is just proof that you are struggling to live. ~Nico Robin
The power to overcome adversity lies within your will. ~Zoro
If you don't take risks, you can't create a future. ~Luffy
Heroes are people who share their sake with everyone, but I want to drink it all myself. ~Luffy
The weak don't get to decide anything, not even how they die. ~Law
Don't ever think there is any perfect world. If there were, we wouldn't need to live. ~Dr. Hiriluk
The world has too many heroes. It needs a monster. ~Kaido
I don't want to conquer anything. I just think the guy with the most freedom in this whole ocean is the Pirate King! ~Luffy
Destiny. Fate. Dreams. These unstoppable ideas are held deep within the heart of man. ~Gold Roger
There is no such thing as a born criminal. ~Iceburg
You can't bring back what you've lost, so think about what you still have. ~Jinbe
If you are hungry, eat. If you are tired, sleep. That is the law of the sea. ~Luffy
A man's dream will never die! ~Blackbeard
To know sorrow is not terrifying. What is terrifying is to know you can't go back to happiness. ~Dalton
People's dreams have no end! ~Blackbeard
Only those who have suffered long can see the light within the shadows. ~Rayleigh
I'll die smiling because if you ever think of me in the future, I want you to remember me smiling. ~Rosinante
The moment you give up is the moment you lose. ~Crocodile
Freedom is something you have to grab for yourself. ~Luffy
History may be taboo, but the truth is unstoppable. ~Nico Robin
I don't care if I'm a monster as long as I have the strength to protect my friends. ~Chopper
What keeps me alive in this world is neither organs nor brains. It's my pride! ~Brook
Inherited Will, The Destiny of the Age, and The Dreams of the People. These things will never cease! ~Gold Roger
Compassion is not a crime. ~Vivi
The era where people dreamed is over? What a load of bullshit! ~Blackbeard
If you want to protect something, protect it to the end. ~Luffy
There are things you can't see unless you change your standing. ~Law
Don't start a fight if you can't end it. ~Sanji
Maybe nothing in this world happens by accident. Our destiny slowly takes shape. ~Rayleigh
I want to be stronger, so I can protect everything. ~Luffy
It's not about whether it's possible or not. I'm doing it because I want to. ~Luffy
Life is like a pencil that will surely run out, but will leave the beautiful writing of life. ~Nami
Protect what is dear to you, even if it costs your life. ~Zoro
The strongest ones are the ones who admit their weaknesses. ~Whitebeard
To complain about being weak gets you nowhere. ~Zoro
When the world shoves you around, you just gotta stand up and shove back. ~Zoro
I don't need any help with the map to my dreams. ~Luffy
You want my treasure? You can have it! I left everything I gathered together in one place. ~Gold Roger
Only I can call my dream stupid! ~Luffy
The darker the night, the brighter the dawn. ~Toki
A man who cannot wipe away the tears from a woman's eyes is not a man. ~Sanji
Strength isn't just about power, it's about spirit. ~Zoro
Everything has a beginning and an end. ~Rayleigh
Pirates are evil? Marines are righteous? These terms change throughout history! ~Doflamingo
The lessons we learn from pain are the ones that stick. ~Luffy
A wound that would make an ordinary man unconscious... I won't lose to it. ~Zoro
If I lose here, my entire journey was meaningless. ~Luffy
The only ones who should kill are those who are prepared to be killed. ~Luffy
Loss is part of growth. ~Rayleigh
Dreams don't have limits. ~Luffy
Knowledge is the strongest weapon. ~Nico Robin
A crew is only as strong as its bonds. ~Luffy
The sea is vast. One day, without fail, friends who will protect you will appear! ~Jaguar D. Saul
If you can't change the world, change yourself. ~Rayleigh
True strength is born from the desire to protect. ~Luffy
Pirates should never bow their heads to anyone! ~Luffy
The heart is what matters most. ~Zoro
Survival is the only victory. ~Zoro
You can't protect anything with just words. ~Luffy
Don't let the past hold you back from the future. ~Luffy
Even in the depths of Hell, the bloom of friendship flowers. ~Bentham
A king without compassion is just a tyrant. ~Luffy
The truth is hidden in the shadows of the world. ~Robin
There is no sin in living. ~Franky
The price of freedom is high. ~Luffy
Scars on the back are a swordsman's shame. ~Zoro
I will never run away again! ~Usopp
The world is round. The journey never ends. ~Luffy
Even if you are weak, there are ways to fight. ~Usopp
A hero is someone who gives their life for something bigger. ~Luffy
Believe in yourself and your nakama. ~Luffy
The curse of the bloodline is not the end of the story. ~Ace
Justice is defined by the winner. ~Doflamingo
Don't waste your time looking back. ~Sanji
A brave warrior of the sea never shakes. ~Usopp
The best way to predict the future is to create it. ~Luffy
I will become the Pirate King! ~Luffy
No one is born into this world to be alone! ~Jaguar D. Saul
Living is not a crime! ~Franky
I would rather die than give up on my pride! ~Zoro
Strength without a cause is just violence. ~Zoro
The real treasure is the journey itself. ~Luffy
I don't want to hear where the treasure is! If I find out, I'll quit being a pirate! ~Luffy
I'd rather be a monster than a coward. ~Chopper
People don't fear death, they fear the unknown. ~Robin
The flame of revolution never dies. ~Sabo
A true leader takes the blame and gives the credit. ~Luffy
You can't escape the consequences of your actions. ~Crocodile
The Will of D will always find a way. ~Law
Without strength, you can't protect the ones you love. ~Garp
Even the smallest spark can light a fire. ~Dragon
There is no such thing as an unbreakable wall. ~Luffy
I am going to be the strongest swordsman in the world! ~Zoro
The rain always stops eventually. ~Luffy
Your life is your own. Don't let anyone else live it for you. ~Luffy
The world is waiting for a change. ~Dragon
True justice is found in the heart, not the law. ~Fujitora
I will never back down! ~Luffy
The path to the top is lonely. ~Zoro
Every dream starts with a single step. ~Luffy
The ocean doesn't care about your plans. ~Luffy
A man's word is his bond. ~Zoro
The truth will set you free, but first it will make you miserable. ~Robin
I refuse to accept a defeat without a fight. ~Luffy
The Void Century holds the secrets of the world. ~Robin
I will protect my crew at all costs. ~Luffy
The only limit is the one you set for yourself. ~Luffy
Don't let fear stop you from sailing. ~Luffy
A promise is a promise. ~Luffy
The world is full of mysteries. ~Robin
I will make the whole world recognize my name! ~Zoro
The spirit of adventure never fades. ~Luffy
Power is temporary, but legends are forever. ~Whitebeard
The sun will rise again. ~Pedro
I am the captain of this ship! ~Luffy
The future belongs to those who believe in their dreams. ~Luffy
I will not die until I see the end of this journey. ~Luffy
Strength is the ability to stand back up. ~Luffy
The world is a dangerous place, but it's also beautiful. ~Luffy
I will find the All Blue! ~Sanji
A pirate's pride is unbreakable. ~Zoro
The truth is often hidden in plain sight. ~Robin
I will never give up on my friends! ~Luffy
The destiny of the world is in our hands. ~Dragon
I am ready for anything. ~Zoro
The spirit of the Pirate King lives on. ~Luffy
I will carve my name into history! ~Zoro
The journey is just beginning. ~Luffy
I will be the one to change everything! ~Luffy
The power of friendship is the greatest power of all. ~Luffy
I will never stop chasing my dreams. ~Luffy
The world is ours to explore! ~Luffy
I will become the greatest of all time! ~Luffy
The adventure continues! ~Luffy
I am the master of my own fate! ~Luffy
The sea is calling my name! ~Luffy
I will reach the end of the Grand Line! ~Luffy
Inherited will... destiny of the age... dreams of the people. ~Rayleigh
I'll be the one who becomes Pirate King! ~Luffy
My name is Dr. Hiriluk, I am a doctor! ~Hiriluk
People's dreams never die! ~Blackbeard
I'll make you the King of Pirates! ~Zoro
Cooks don't use their hands to fight. ~Sanji
I will find the truth of history. ~Robin
wyr: Would you rather always have to announce to the room whenever you have to pee or pee your pants once a year in public?
Would you rather live without music or live without television?
Would you rather have a permanently itchy butthole or permanently sticky fingers?
Would you rather always have wet socks or always have an eyelash in your eye?
Would you rather have to give up sex for a year or give up your phone for a year?
Would you rather find your soulmate but they have a stinky breath forever or be alone and rich?
Would you rather have to watch an ad every time you open your eyes in the morning or pay $1 every time you blink?
Would you rather accidentally send a nude to your boss or a recording of you talking shit about them?
Would you rather always smell like sour milk or always smell like a public toilet?
Would you rather have to wear a clown suit every day for a year or be naked in public for 5 minutes?
Would you rather have to fight a chicken every time you get into a car or a rat every time you get into bed?
Would you rather have a hole in your lungs or a hole in your heart?
Would you rather only be able to eat raw onions or only be able to drink expired milk?
Would you rather be famous for something embarrassing or be unknown but a hero?
Would you rather have to moan every time you eat something delicious or bark every time you see a stranger?
Would you rather be able to see 10 minutes into the future or 150 years into the future?
Would you rather have to sleep in a bed of snakes or a bed of giant spiders?
Would you rather have to walk on lego blocks for the rest of your life or have to wash your hair with orange juice?
Would you rather know the date you die or the cause of your death?
Would you rather have to post your search history on social media or your last 10 photos in the gallery?
Would you rather be able to fly but only at 2 miles per hour or run at 100 miles per hour but only in reverse?
Would you rather always have to tell the truth or always have to lie?
Would you rather have a head the size of a tennis ball or the size of a watermelon?
Would you rather have to drink a gallon of sweat or a gallon of spit?
Would you rather have to live in a world with no internet or a world with no toilet paper?
Would you rather be the smartest person in the world but be ugly or be the dumbest but be gorgeous?
Would you rather be able to talk to animals or speak every human language?
Would you rather have to re-live your most embarrassing moment every day or lose all your teeth?
Would you rather have to eat a bowl of hair or a bowl of clipped toe nails?
Would you rather always feel like you have to sneeze or always feel like you have to pee?
Would you rather have no taste buds or be colorblind?
Would you rather have to run everywhere you go or have to shout everything you say?
Would you rather have sex with your worst enemy or have your crush watch you get rejected by a 1/10?
Would you rather have a pet dragon or be a dragon?
Would you rather always have bad breath or always have body odor?
Would you rather have to wear dirty underwear for a week or no underwear for a month?
Would you rather be caught cheating on your partner or catch your partner cheating on you?
Would you rather have to eat everything with ketchup or everything with mayo?
Would you rather have to swap bodies with the person you hate most for a day or stay as yourself but be blind for a day?
Would you rather have a tail or have horns?
Would you rather always have to dance when you hear music or always have to sing along?
Would you rather have to eat a live cockroach or a dead mouse?
Would you rather be able to stop time or rewind time?
Would you rather have to live on an island alone or in a crowded city where no one speaks your language?
Would you rather be able to read minds but only the negative thoughts or not be able to read minds at all?
Would you rather have to lick the floor of a subway or the bottom of your shoe?
Would you rather have to wear soaking wet jeans for a year or no socks for the rest of your life?
Would you rather always be 10 minutes late or 20 minutes early?
Would you rather have a third eye or a third arm?
Would you rather be able to change your gender at will or change your age at will?
Would you rather have to watch the same movie every day or listen to the same song every hour?
Would you rather be able to invisibly watch anyone or be able to teleport anywhere?
Would you rather have to work a job you hate for high pay or a job you love for no pay?
Would you rather lose your sense of smell or your sense of touch?
Would you rather have to eat 10 pounds of cheese or 10 pounds of chocolate in one sitting?
Would you rather be attacked by a bear or a swarm of bees?

thoughts: If an unstoppable force meets an immovable object, the only possible outcome is that they pass through each other like ghosts.
If you replace every single plank on a ship over time, is it still the same ship, or a completely new one?
If a person with multiple personalities threatens to kill themselves, is it a hostage situation?
The word 'swims' upside down is still 'swims'.
If you try to fail and you succeed, which one did you actually do?
Every 'do not touch' sign is written in braille for a reason.
If you were born deaf, what language would you think in?

If you're waiting for the waiter, aren't you the waiter?

If you drop soap on the floor, is the floor clean or is the soap dirty?
At what point does a 'hill' become a 'mountain'?
If you had a time machine and went back to kill your past self, you wouldn't exist to go back in time, so you'd still be alive.
If we are what we eat, then vegetarians are technically made of plants.
Technically, you're always staring at your nose, your brain just chooses to ignore it.

Your future self is watching you right now through a memory.

A fire truck is actually a water truck.

If you're 20 years old, you've spent about 7 years with your eyes closed.
